data.answer: Dynamic vacuum for 12 hours at 120 Â°C

data.question: What is the BET surface area of NU-1601?
What is the experimental pore volume of NU-1602?
How is the NU-1600 series MOFs activated?
data.answer: NU-1600 is activated under a dynamic vacuum, while NU-1601 and NU-1602 are activated using supercritical CO2 (ScCO2) procedure followed by dynamic vacuum.

What is the effect of increasing the catalyst loading from 1.5 mol% to 6 mol% on the half-life of DMNP hydrolysis with NU-1600?
data.answer: Decreasing the half-life from 3.6 minutes to 0.7 minutes

data.question: What is the linker per Zr6 node in NU-1601 compared to NU-1600 based on TGA data?
